extendedInfo.description: EventPilotÂ® AAOS 2013 conference app is your full featured guide to manage your American Academy of Orthopaedic Surgeons conference attendance. reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Makes the meeting.  All abstracts in the palm of your hand.   Excellent note function.
reviews.author: william warden
